long_description: The Buck 110 Classic Folding Hunter knife celebrates timeless style and convenient function with solid workmanship and quality materials in a design that has stood the test of time. 420HC stainless-steel blade. Easy opening and closing with nail notch in the blade. Reliable lock-back design secures blade in the open position. Lustrous Macassar ebony dymondwood handle with brass bolsters.
short_description: The Buck 110 Classic Folding Hunter knife celebrates timeless style and convenient function with solid workmanship and quality materials in a design that has stood the test of time.
